title: The Big Downsize
overview: The Big DownsizeÂ is an exploration of why we love our possessions so much and the emotional baggage and stress that comes crashing down when there is no choice but to let things go.De-cluttering queen Jane Veldhoven, knows what it takes to get this job done. She's been helping people downsize their lives for over 15 years and she's about to start this journey with two more families in over their heads.
